At Bitzone we have the professionals to.es: En Bitzone contamos con los profesionales para construir tu futuro
At Bitzone we have the professionals to.en: At Bitzone we have the professionals to build your future

We build the future of Peru and the worl.es: Construimos el futuro del Perú y del mundo
We build the future of Peru and the worl.en: We build the future of Peru and the world

We have experience carrying out projects.es: Contamos con experiencia realizando proyectos de software para empresas tanto peruanas como extranjeras. Somos reconocidos por la calidad de nuestro equipo y nuestro trabajo. ¿Qué esperas que construyamos juntos el futuro que tanto anhelas?
We have experience carrying out projects.en: We have experience carrying out software projects for both Peruvian and foreign companies. We are recognized for the quality of our team and our work. What do you hope that we build together the future that you long for?

We will respond to you in a maximum of 2.es: Te responderemos en un máximo de 2 días hábiles
We will respond to you in a maximum of 2.en: We will respond to you in a maximum of 2 business days

Tell us your reasons, questions....es: Cuéntanos tus motivos, consultas, idea de proyecto... ¡Queremos escucharte!
Tell us your reasons, questions....en: Tell us your reasons, questions, project idea ... We want to hear from you!

Thank you for taking this first....es: Gracias por dar este primer paso junto con nosotros. Te estaremos respondiendo lo más pronto posible.
Thank you for taking this first....en: Thank you for taking this first step together with us. We will be answering you as soon as possible.
